title: Intro to Combustion
description: Basics of combustion and combustion devices. Chemical thermodynamics, reaction rates, premixed/nonpremixed flames, ignition, stabilization, and pollutants.  Applications in turbine, rocket, and internal combustion engines.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
